review:
The game loads faster and runs much smoother than in Battle.Net!
...That's a good thing, right? 








But that's about it. Of course the review is positive because many people having a negative (yet valid) opinion makes Steam view it as review bombing so it gets removed ASAP (looking at you Skullgirls).
How shameless can a company be? Making part of the pseudo-PVE cost real life money? Not even launching the event missions all at once?
Seriously, whoever spends a single dime on this game is probably beyond redemption. Those that have an ounce of self-respect, either play FOR FREE, or don't play.

The worst community gaming has to offer, but the gameplay itself has me clinically addicted and I hate to say this is my most played game of all time.
you can't even get player icons anymore wtf

DO NOT PLAY. i have been a long time OW fan and have put thousands of hours across multiple accounts in this game. I loved this game for years and its sad to see all the terrible things Blizzard did to this game. i was hyped for Overwatch 2 the day it was announced. I played this game since early 2017 and it was the first multiplayer game i really got into and played nearly daily until OW season 2. I just cant with this game and i really wish i could enjoy this game again.

why u banned my account for no reason?
blizzard is the worst game company ever.
never consider gamer's feelings
